title: My Account has been Permanently Banned
body:
Okay, I admit that I'm a repeat offender of the Instant Feedback System, I've got about 3 accounts permabanned from not learning my lesson. Now, I log on today for a couple league matches, I meet a guy in a game, who was convinced that I was somehow horrible, and kept on bullying me, so I stood up to the bully, and started roasting the * out of him (but I was toxic), see, I learned my lesson the time when I got my 2 week ban, and this is one of the incidents that got me permabanned, the other one was when me and an enemy Vladimir were having a quick banter sesh, it involved little to no toxicity, and we were just having fun. I think that players got the wrong idea when I was talking to the Vladimir in that game, and I don't think it's just to punish me for having fun in League of Legends, which is a game.

Although Riot have not e-mailed me about which games that I was toxic in, I'm pretty sure it was the two I mentioned earlier.

In the first game where I was permanently banned for being too toxic, I was playing as Malzahar in an ARSR (All Random Summoner's Rift) game, a teammate Mundo was harassing me, kept saying that I was horrible at the game, this trash that trash, so I tried to tell him to stop. Whenever he said something I told him to calm down, because I thought that it would help calm the situation, but when he started blaming a fellow teammate Cho' Gath, was when I got really angry. He started blaming Cho' Gath for our "loss" (even though we had not lost yet) and was harassing him as well. I stood up to him and started swearing a lot at him because I lost my *. At the end of the game, the person who I was defending, the Cho' Gath, reported both myself and the Mundo on our team, I'm not sure why he reported me because I didn't say or do anything toxic to him, and was actually trying to help him.

In the second game, the last game I played before this discussion, I was playing as Nidalee in another ARSR game, where I was pretty much dominating, except for the enemy Vlad who would kill me every time he saw the chance to. Vladimir and I had started engaging in some friendly banter, and were exchanging comebacks (friendly). He would call me an "ugly rat" and I'd call him a "stinky tampon", I didn't mean any of these insults to be nasty. It even got to the point where I would use "heck" or "frick" against him. I believe that someone had a misunderstanding, and didn't understand that the banter was on friendly terms, and we weren't trying to offend each other. I recall a teammate Amumu regarding the League of Legends community as "accepting" and that he always felt included when he got on.

I will post what I said in both these games when Riot e-mails me about the Permaban, giving me more information to work with. I've been with League since I was 10 years old, and, although being toxic on more than one occasion, tried to help the LoL community in any way possible.

Edit: Never got the e-mail, logged on to see what I got banned for, turns out I only got banned for toxicity in one game, not two.

replies.body: Don't know who you cant see why you wouldn't be banned, 80% of that log is considered offensive, friendly or not.

The one that I "offended" friended me after the game, and we were about to play another game together. Friendly banter is in every gaming community, and is a great way to meet new people and make friends. If 80% of my chat log is me trying to befriend an enemy player, I honestly can't see why I should be banned.
Remember that there are 8 other players in the game which likely found your "banter" to be distasteful. Clearly you were negatively affecting experiences if you were reported for it.

Doesn't matter if you were trying to be friendly, the automated system can distinguish friendly from non-friendly. Simple fact is 80% of it was toxic, the system saw no more no less.

Your "Banter" to anyone else viewing the game would seem just like a pissed off 9-12 yearold anyway.

"banter" probably because others don't want to listen to you great banter that is clearly so good H MY GOD FUCK OFF YOU STINKY PERIODHEAD oh what a ripper and side spliter don't know why rito would decide to ban you for saying this at all

How about the fact that this is considered to be   a game for all ages and such language  shouldn't be used in   game that children could be playing even if the other people around you don't mind the use of that language
And u started when u were 10...
I can’t see anything wrong with the game that you were perm banned for, all I see is a recovering toxic player trying to talk to another player, but with some friendly banter

While most of you chat log can be considered toxic to people outside of the "banter"context, there is one line that jumps out. 

>FistMeDaddy666: bullseye %%%ggot.

Even if it's just "friendly banter", homophobic slurs are **never** ok. The system routinely escalates chat logs containing racist, homophobic or sexist language up to permaban status.

But honestly, I don't think I should get banned FOREVER for just that. I don't have an excuse to what I typed, but I think it's way too much for saying a homophobic slur. Now, I'm not for homophobic, racial and sexist slurs, and I would never actually mean what I said... Honestly, I think the system went overboard with permanently banning me for just that, I mean, if I was banned for 3 games, and multiple toxic insults, I'd probably be fine with it, but I honestly believe that Riot went overboard with this permban.

Mate, ur gonna keep getting  banned till u learn ur lesson. U have been banned on three accounts already, maybe you would think it would have started to sink in. And being homophobic is just so stupid, just stay away from all that shit. Ur probably a good person, just think before u type unless u want more accounts to get banned.

If you don't want to get another account banned, then as soon as someone says something bad, mute them. 
/mute all if you have to

It takes more than one game to get permabanned, they just chose to take logs from the game that got you banned, or just chose one of the many games that got you banned.    

Be a better person, or expect to get banned on any new accounts you create.

I'm going to analyse my own words, and try to figure out what could've been offensive to others.

Now, some people could've taken this really seriously, although they were ONLY directed at the enemy Vladimir, who was happily engaging in FRIENDLY BANTER with me, I honestly can't anything I did wrong.
